channel.title: Hindustan Times | Facebook RSS Feed
channel.description: This is an RSS feed of the three most recent posts at https://www.facebook.com/hindustantimes

item.title: An #internship application ask
item.description: An #internship application asking candidates about their sexual orientation, race and gender identity has gone #viral online

item.title: #Crickit | #SuryakumarYadav wa
item.description: #Crickit | #SuryakumarYadav was mobbed by fans, who almost entered the ground during the middle of the home team's first innings (via CrickIt)

item.title: #DracoMalfoy and #NevilleLongb
item.description: #DracoMalfoy and #NevilleLongbottom from the Harry Potter franchise squared off in a cricket match
